text: In Zulu mythology, Uhlanga is the marsh from which humanity was born. Unkulunkulu is humanity's progenitor and was the offshoot of Umvelinqangi. ==References== * Leslie, David (1875) Among the Zulus and Amatongas: with sketches of the natives, their language and customs; and the country, products, climate, wild animals, etc Edmonston & Douglas, Edinburgh; * Hahn, Theophilus (1881) Tsuni||Goam, the Supreme Being of the Khoi-Khoi Tr√ºbner, London; Category:Bogs, fens and marshes in mythology Category:Zulu mythology
title: Uhlanga
